item.description:
The featured readers at this session of the Dire Literary Series are James Boice, Daniel Trask and Len Solo. Hosted as usual by organizer Timothy Gager. An open mic will follow the reading. For details on this evening and the series, visit http://direreader.com....

After the reading, any interested parties will be welcome to join us as we retire to a local bar or restaurant, to have a drink and to discuss our recent writing. To find us after the reading, or for directions to the Gallery, give me a ring: 617-935-4951.
item.name: Dire Literary Series reading, w/ retreat to bar for discussion & drinks after
